welcome_message_body: Welcome to Seaside, where the charming coastal town meets the Pacific Ocean. Known for its stunning beaches, vibrant boardwalk, and lively atmosphere, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Seaside has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!

restaurants.name: Panera Bread
restaurants.description: Panera Bread is a bakery located in Sand City.

restaurants.name: Harumi
restaurants.description: Harumi is a sushi restaurant located in Seaside.

restaurants.name: Baldemiro's Taco Shop
restaurants.description: Baldemiro's Taco Shop is a mexican restaurant located in Seaside.

restaurants.name: The Butter House
restaurants.description: The Butter House is a american restaurant located in Seaside.

restaurants.name: Mals Market and Deli
restaurants.description: Mals Market and Deli is a sandwich spot located in Seaside.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monterey Peninsula Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marina Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Marina Municipal Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Salinas Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Salinas Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hollister Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights, providing a more luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
